text: Dude thanks for this! My favorite song of the series is the one where Darc snaps. That flute one
author: Zasso no Kemuri

text:
The music made this game so much more epic. Modern games should take note. Even classical and rock can work in an RPG. You just gotta do it right. Heck you can even throw in some bagpipes, hah. Nothing can stop a good composer.

author: Namadu

text:
This game is brilliant. The music is fantastic to listen to, and the gameplay itself is kind of addicting. I like how it was done.

...On another note, I loved watching Maru say "Is this edible?" while picking up a bomb. :D

text: @boontohumanity Nope, End of Darkness is just a pile of shit. Some sort of contest i think, no actual story related to the arc world.

text: @DogiTheWallcrusher The translation's differences also messed it up pretty badly, but as for the ending...  There's another Arc the Lad after this, which must at least /help/ address any loose ends..?  Possibly?

text: Wow, this was such an underrated game. The storyline was excellent, and different from what you'd expect. Too bad FF got way more attention than this little gem!

text: Are you the enemy?
author: Logicblade

text: @Gamemusichannel1 Twlight is nowhere near as good as the originals. It's still solid gameplay wise if a bit slow, but the story is kinda laughable and the ending resolves almost nothing that happened throughout the story.
author: Dogi

text:
I love how many of the tracks of this game have positive and agressive aspects to it's songs. The contrasting feels and the key signature changes create a very strong effect.

And for some reason, the part at 0:46 sounds like an intro to a tv show, where they show who all the actors are in a quick 20 second summary.

text: nolstagiagasm! I completely ran into this on accident. I haven't played this game in 3 years yet I can still hum all the tunes as soon as I hear them. lol.

text: Very few people actually played Arc the Lad:TotS, and it's great to see its soundtrack get some recognition. This song is great, but some tracks are even better. Is there a chance that you'll post another tune from this game?
